com.exlibris.dps.sdk.delivery

Interface ViewerPreProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractViewerPreProcessor

    public interface ViewerPreProcessor
    Interface for a VPPPlugin type plugin. This plugin processes a Delivery request. It prepares a URL for a specific file viewer based on the parameters given. An implementation of ViewerPreProcessor should use the Access API in order to prepare the metadata/files for the viewer
    Author:
    lear

    • Method Summary

      Performs the pre-viewer processing tasks.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(DnxDocument dnx,
        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> viewContext,
        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
        java.lang.String dvs,
        java.lang.String ieParentId,
        java.lang.String repDirName)
          throws com.exlibris.dps.sdk.access.AccessException
        This method is called by the Delivery framework before the call for the execute method
        Parameters:
        dnx - The dnx of the requested PID (IE/REP/FILE)
        viewContext - Holds the viewer parameters list
        request - The HTTP request object
        dvs - The Delivery session key
        Throws:
        com.exlibris.dps.sdk.access.AccessException

      • execute

        void execute()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs the pre-viewer processing tasks. For example: 1. Copies the stream to the viewer directory. 2. Runs XSLT
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • runASync

        boolean runASync()
        Returns:
        true for Asyncronized pre-processing, meaning the vpp will be run in a separate thread while the viewer displays a progress bar. otherwise return false.

      • getPid

        java.lang.String getPid()
        Returns:
        the requested pid

      • getDvs

        java.lang.String getDvs()
        Returns:
        dvs- the delivery session key

      • getAdditionalParameters

        java.lang.String getAdditionalParameters()
        Returns:
        additional parameters needed for the viewer
